name: commit_activity
description: Tracks the number of commits, who made them, and details about the changes in the commits.

dimensions.name: committed_date
dimensions.description: The timestamp when the commit was made. If the questions is for a value over time without specifying time granularity, return daily values

dimensions.name: author__user__login
dimensions.description: The login of the user who made the commit.

dimensions.name: additions
dimensions.description: The number of lines added in the commit.

dimensions.name: deletions
dimensions.description: The number of lines deleted in the commit.

dimensions.name: changed_files
dimensions.description: The number of files changed in the commit.

measures.name: total_commits
measures.description: The total number of commits made.

measures.name: max_lines_changed
measures.description: The maximum number of lines changed in a single commit.

sample_questions: How many commits have been made on the repo?
Who has made the most commits?
Which commit had the most lines of code changed?
give me information about the last xxx commits
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT committed_date, author__user__login, additions, deletions, changed_files FROM commits.commits
